item.description:
Join vegan Chef, Chad Sarno, of Crazy Sexy Kitchen at Whole Foods Market in Portland on Mon, March 4th at 7:30pm for a demo & talk. Advanced registration is required at the customer service desk, so call 774-7711 to reserve your spot. The fee is $25 & includes an autographed copy of the book, Crazy Sexy Kitchen, & a goodie bag too! Hope to see you there.

NOTE: The 5:30 seating is SOLD OUT & this one will sell out too, so get your spot today!

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Chef Chad Sarno at Whole Foods Market, Portland, ME
